articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings

9:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will receive the seasonal flu shot.

Note for media:

  • Restricted pool coverage

The Prime Minister will speak with the Premier of Manitoba, Heather Stefanson.
